MIME element (text/plain)
Dear Host, 
 
It appears you are hosting a fraud site at squaring-trans.com 
 
This notice is provided in accordance with the U.S. Digital Millennium
Copyright Act. The undersigned is authorized to act on behalf of
Escrow.com and its affiliated licensed escrow services providers,
Internet Escrow Services ("IES") and EC Services Corporation ("ECSC").
It has been brought to our attention that your company provides services
to a website, [squaring-trans.com], which is infringing on Escrow.com's
intellectual property rights to the material posted on Escrow.com
(www.Escrow.com <http://www.escrow.com/>). This site has stolen content
from Escrow.com for the purpose of defrauding consumers attempting to
buy and sell over the Internet. Please disable this site immediately 
 
Following is a direct link to one of the offending pages of the
[squaring-trans.com] site, <http://www.squaring-trans.com/company.php>.
Neither Escrow.com nor IES has any affiliation with
[squaring-trans.com], and has a good faith belief that use of the
material in the manner complained of is not authorized by the copyright
owner, its agent or the law.   
 
The information contained in this notice is accurate, and under penalty
of perjury, this office is authorized to act on behalf of Escrow.com.
Thank you.   
 
Josh Smith
Security Team
Escrow.com
16251 Laguna Canyon Road Suite 150
Irvine, CA 92618

International 1.949.790.5890
